From Fiameta July 10, 1998
It was disclosed that Eritrea would recently pull out her troops from the security Zone that's going to be established.
In order to continue the process of establishing a temporary security zones between Ethiopian and Eritrean troops, Eritrean troops would start moving backwards as from May 5, 2001 ENA reported quoting the United Nations mission for Ethiopia and Eritrea.
The mission in its statement yesterday, recalled that Eritrea didn't fulfill her duties to pull out her troops by last March 2, 2001, being against some issues on the would-be established temporary security zone at the Southern border, but now decided to take out her troops after five days without any conditions.
However, the country disclosed that she expected some amendments from the United Nations Mission to give focus and resolve the complaints Eritrea has vis-à-vis the temporary security zone southern border..
The mission pointed out that Eritrea disclosed her decision to pull out her troops with out any condition from the would-be established temporary security zone in a meeting held in Asmara with the deputy of Kofi Anan and representative of United Nations Mission for Ethiopia and Eritrea, Ian martin and the mission's Force commander-in-chief major General Patrick Kamert.
The special messenger of the secretary of the United Nations in Addis Ababa, Legwayla Joseph legwayla, said the decision is encouraging and expressed his acceptance.
The next military coordinating commission meeting that would be led by the mission's Force Commander-in-chief and where high military representatives of both countries are participating, is planned to be held on May 6, 2001, it was disclosed.
On the other hand, with regards to the bomb blast at the Eritrean's Tsorena on three United Nations vehicles that injured Canadian Peace Forces and as to the claim Eritrean radio broadcasted accusing Ethiopia for planting it, he replied for the time being the mission couldn't prove which side planted the bomb..
The spokesperson told for the United Nations Integrative Regional Information Network (IRIN) that since that mission didn't get full information pertaining bombs, it is not in a position to prove such kind of information.
The mission's spokesperson for bombs coordinator committee in Asmara, Fil Lewis on his part said that the report the radio broadcasted is what was given by the Eritrean Political commissioner and not by the mission, walta Information Center reported..
It is to be recalled that as a result of an ammunition that went off by itself due to a bomb explosion in Eritrea on March 12, 13 and 18, 2001, a damage was brought about on vechiles and Soldiers of United Nations Mission for Ethiopia and Eritrea.

It released the statement this month.
The chief also gave a response saying it "Empty".
The priests and the laity who saw this statement which was full of insults and which was released at a time of Lout when priests and the laity were found fasting praying and let reading for prayer, were deeply saddened, the suggestions that came out from different directions pointed out.
The publication of the clergy in "church News" in its August 15, 1999 edition under the title, "A statement released by the clergy" excoriated Chief Ayalew with plain insulting words - the statement.
The statement which convicted the dignified elderly man and a "scholar" who served the church for 50 years Chief Ayalew Tamiru calling his Excellency as plain "he" put the church at a mercy; and was a reflection of an expression of the officials' hatred on Chief Ayalew, and it opened a door for the church to become distrubed in the time ahead, just like the previous years..
the message came out in response to what chief Ayalew said with regards to the ordination of arch-bishops on July 13, 1999 on a free press newspaper, Time, under the title "The arch-bishops should have been ordained on Sunday rather than on Monday for it violated the dogma of the church..
The statement was released in response to this convicting and criticizing it.
While the message of chief Ayalew was basically the ordination should have taken place on Sunday, the clergy's statement, said "the ordination from arch-bishop to the patriarchood was given to the holy apostles not on Sunday but on some other day". .
The statement expressed through this that the earlier apostles were also arch-bishops and patriarchs.
Moreover, the statement belittled chief Ayalew's message by elaborating, "The ordination up to patriarch-hood was performed on the day of Ascension.
The Ascension was on Thursday ... As our Lord ordained priesthood on Sunday, He also ordained bishops on other days."
The statement denigrated Chief Ayalew's message by that.
The use of words in the statement was rude, indecent and not expected from the church's press, and except few, the majority workers of the clergy found it disgusting, the related news pointed out..

There are people who were critical about this statement.

Leave alone the rest, these sides say, "Let alone this statement which was full of insults and that came out on August '99 on its church News, is a response for what was written in June and July, which had been read and written long ago, the fact that this elderly and ancient church not releasing new works that are done timely by itself is indicative of shortage of people within the institution, they said.
While these days new beliefs release publications monthly and weekly and even shorter than this time length, establishing book stores in every quarter and widening their beliefs, it's sorrowful to see the earlier church turning in to an insulting forum, they are not few who admit this.
There are other who expressed their appreciation saying that if there's one body that's active and operates on its won interest and effort, it's the group called "Mahbere Kidusan".
It has been painful for all to see yesterday, today, last year, the year before last the church being full of turmoil and losing her peace and unity.
"The unlucky church" they said with sorrow.
The chief, in response to the statement from the clergy, stated that he has served the church more than fifty years, and that he is not new for the church and the laity, that he very well knows the church's overall discipline, and that he has worked what ever he has to, and said that the statement released from the clergy was far from the Biblical truth.
In his response entitled "The Euphorbia of Monday and Her Blessing" in a private news paper, it was possible to understand that the church doesn't have people who grew up in spiritual knowledge.
The comment written on chief Ayalew was completely irrelevant and inappropriate, professional religious people suggested.
The chief not only criticized the statement by saying "Empty and Linseed" but also elaborated by mentioning the right evidence – in his response.
Not only is chief Ayalew known by being a scholar, but he's a real professional, who's believed to be anointed by God and able to express his knowledge and the dogma of the church in good condition, as most agree.
Therefore, the statement of the clergy mentioned that the ordination of the bishops in not necessarily on Sunday while Chief Ayalew came up with a statement saying "Arch-bishops should be ordained on Sunday, the election should also be made on Sunday.
This has said by Apostles in Didskilie, Article 37 scholars in Spiritual Justice Article 5 they wrote, ordered this."
He wrote the basic tangible evidence.
Many say that the clergy made a statement just to express her hatred on Chief Ayalew, otherwise, the church didn't have earlier, doesn't have now and won't have in the future a multi-purpose professional like chief Ayalew.

America Warned Her Citizens!.
ELF Protested against Ethiopia, Opposition Organizations Protested against Eritrea!
The American Foreign Affairs Office requested American citizens to be far away from the tensioned areas of Ethiopia and Eritrea.
American citizen workers who are located around the border are made to transfer to another place until situations calm down, the office disclosed.
The areas mentioned are Tigreay, northern Afar, south of Keren town and south-eastern Eritrea.
It was disclosed that United States government workers were also made to go out from Eritrean Mendefera towns sough and eastern parts, from Asab, too.
The office warned the Americans to go out form the mentioned areas.
In the mean time, the organization which is in exile and opposition for EPLF, ELF protested against Ethiopia's claim of land and expressed its support for EPLF.
According to the statement of ELF, the present claim of land Ethiopia requested belongs to Eritrea, it described.
According to the sources which claim to be close to the issue, said, Bademe was under the control of ELF and in a war fought with EPLF it was taken from them for they were defeated and EPLF gave it to TPLF temporarily as a camp, these sources are heard saying.
On the other hand, opposition organization to EPRDF, condemn Eritrea's aggression from the perspective of a sovereign nation.
In particular, EDU which controlled the surrounding areas of Beademe at the time of armed struggle stated in the released statement that Beademe is Ethiopia's.
The AU Amhara peoples organization (AAPO), Ethiopian peace and Democracy Alternative Force (EPDA), All Ethiopian Socialist Movement (AESM), Oromo Liberation Front (OLF), Ethiopian People Revolutionary Party (EPRP), Medhin Democratic Party gave statements on the current issues.
Among these opposition organizations, EPRP's statement said, "It's not surprising if Meles rose today being sympathetic for Ethiopia whom he has betrayed up to now, and if he doesn't get people to be victims for his usual intrigues,...he used to say that what you said as history is a hundred year history, and not a district but he has Eritrea seceded.   .
If he wanted to withstand with the tail having given the elephant today, it doesn't surpass from being funny,.
He said.
The Oromo Liberation Front (OLF) on its part, reminded that citizens should not participate in this war; citizens should not involve in a clash that doesn't bring about any economic and political change in their life, it said..

Athlete Haile Gebreselassie was awarded an Honorary Law Doctoral Degre.
Athlete Haile Gebreselassie disclosed that he received an honorary law doctoral degree from Ireland National University.
Athlete Haile was awarded the honorary doctorate for his international contribution and participation in working with various social and humanitarian organizations.
The newspaper reported that Haile was selected as a candidate for his doctorate due to his being a winner in athletics for 12 years, as well as his cooperative work with United Nations children's Fund and other humanitarian organizations..
He was selected among 15 intellectuals and finally became among the three winners, he disclosed to the Ethiopian News agency yesterday..
The individuals who were awarded similar doctorate degree were Mr. Vincent Doile, editor-in-chief of Irish Independent newspaper, John Burton, the presently serving ambassador and diplomat to the European Union in America, "Irish Independent" reported.
Among the criterion that enabled him to be selected was his success in preparing athletic competition of International Standard in Addis Ababa, it explained. .

From Fiameta September 25, 1998
The Council of Ministers Presented the Next Year's Budget to the Council of Representatives for Approval
The council of EFDR ministers disclosed that if presented a 15 billion 12 million 900 thousand 900 Birr budget for next year to be approved by the council of representatives.
In its disclosure the council issued to ENA, it said that after widely discussing the regular capital budget draft proclamation of the 2002 Federal Government which was presented by the ministry of Finance and Ministry of Economic Development and Cooperation in the 5th urgent meeting it held yesterday, it decided to passed it to the council of representatives with full vote.
The 2002 Regular and Capital Budget preparation is made based on the new budget working procedure ammendment, it disclosed. .
The request budgets and provision of support is based on the country's income capability, the ongoing economic reform program, focusing on poverty reduction, and comparability of executing bodies to implement it. .
The regular and capital budget of the next year is prepared based on the focused direction of the government's general development strategy, and took in to consideration the budget need of each work institutions and the country's financial capability, comparing to the institutions' duties and work responsibilities, it disclosed.
After discussing widely on the draft proclamation, viewing it in detail the budget request presented from these budgetary organizations, and evaluating the 2001 budget execution, taking in to account the federal government's income capability, comparing it with implementation and programs, sent to council of representatives for approval, it disclosed.
The council pointed out that out of the total budget, the money it sent for approval for regular spending was 7 billion 239 million 430 thousand Birr.
And for capita spending it agreed to assign 3 billion 99 million 708 thousand 900 Birr.
Moreover, including Dire Dawa administration, for regions' subsidy it agreed to assign 673 million 842 thousand Birr, it pointed out..
From Addis Zemen June 20, 2001 .
Editorial
Where is the Direction?
EPRDF's press "Abiyotawi Democracy" last week categorized, including Tobia, the free press "gathering of the Defeated and that operate on the support by opposition sides".
In no time more than 10 editors and publishers of newspapers were arrested.
Three weekly newspapers, that is, Ethiop, wenchif and Urji became out of publication.
The solution shouldn't have been additional assault.
Point in at someone saying that he/she works in the free press wouldn't bring about any good.
"who are you?"
a question would follow.
Instead, what's of worth is giving focus on the information and suggestions the free press offered and corrects one's mistakes on time.
Although we took the suggestion as mere gossip of enemies of democracy that can not support itself with tangible evidence, we would still like to make clear one major issue about the publications of Tobia and its publisher, Akpak.
As a member of free press, when Akpak rose to give service to make public, it was confident of the wide and rich experience of its members, as well as truth and quality of the mind.
From the outset, it doesn't hold any grudges against another. .
Based on what the Ethiopian law commands it was establish had by a capital of 15 people, but it is not the property of one or two people.
When Akpak was established as a publisher of press it took as a light of leading principle not forgetting the responsibility it had for the public, not including favoring political organizations in its work, rather focus on public awareness.
As those sides who do not wish the strengthening of democracy and free press claim, there is no part of the public or party the publication of Akpak favors.
They are forums of free ideas.
It would perform its tasks today and in the future sticking to this principle.
Indeed since it holds the ideas of wide country rather than narrow area, unity rather than difference, love rather than hat red and grudges and since it doesn't accept racial politics, the beneficiaries of the present wind may not like it.
If through the conspiracy anti-press and anti-democratic forces it encounters peril, we won't have tears to shed for there are many young Ethiopians who have made their positions clear to make democracy reign, to serve the mistreated people.
Ethiopia usually gives birth after birth to children who would sacrifice for her.
And the fact that she delivers is being openly witnessed.
Among those who suffer from this regime, became victims of attack and professionals, who frequent hardship, the army of the press is the first and the main one.
Free press is the central pillar and mainstay of democracy.
Free press means the enemy of dictatorial regime.
It means exposing and struggling the injustice and power corruptors.
Therefore, the more the free press members are imprisoned and suffered, the better they feel about their performance that they display with great sacrifice.
They feel proud, not ashamed about it.
When ever dictators tossed and turned, the press they established for the purpose of fanning perfidy and releasing poisonous propaganda cried over nothing, it seems to us that the many journalists who are imprisoned would be consoled.
It is known that we are found in a regime where the prisoners are mostly prisoners of conscience, leaders of political organizations and members, as well as journalists who are conscience of the public.
This situation hasn't changed or improved from day to day.
Had it improved, it would have given the regime a better look.
Nonetheless, the current government is exposed be fore the world in its human rights violation, lack of democratic characteristics, and in its suppression of free press.
The present Prime Minister Mr. Meles Zenawi, who was mentioned by name as one of the ten enemies of the free press, doesn't make anyone proud.
It's not patriotism.
We found condemnation, not admiration in history for a leader who brought suffering to his own fellow people.
The number of journalists who became victims of police and central investigation and were put to the routine threatening prison cells as of recent weeks are many.
Journalists whom the court hasn't passed verdict and whose life are in the police stations and prisons are getting numerous.
Although the young writers who previously were imprisoned for a year and above and were released have borne the pain, it would be difficult to expect to share the pain an innocent citizen undergoes in prison in vain.
It is an experience to show that the democracy and justice which was said to live in our country is now being ejected.
As if the drama which was played in the pretext to law was not sufficient, the newspaper of the ruling party, government, so-called press of organizations attempted to spread malicious gossips and back biting calling the free press and journalists by name.
This doesn't allow the fifth row press that "suppresses" the benefit, security and unity of the people to have legality as well as publicity.
We know what these groups who say "We are journalists; we are the ones who present the right news; we are discharging the duties of the press" are practically performing.
The Ethiopian people, too, know it well.
However we don't think the hired ones know themselves.
We don't miss the fact that the malicious gossip they spread mentioning legal organizations and journalists by name has been the mission and duty they were given from their bosses.    .
Their direction is towards destroying the free press through propaganda as well as using force, so fellow people who say that they stand for the people and democracy, should know it in advance.
It is impossible to think of democracy without free press.
It's not possible to prove being a democrat suppressing and weakening the free press.
From Tobia October 30, 1997
It was Assured Again that the Economic Aim of Revolutionary Democracy is Capitalism
It was disclosed that the economic aim of Revolutionary Democracy being capitalism was proved again in the meeting held in Addis Ababa to evaluate the 10 year struggle of EPRDF.
In a statement the spokesperson of the meeting gave yesterday, it was unambiguously stated in the 1995 EPRDF plenary session that Ethiopia is following capitalism or building the capitalist regime, and now, too it has been assured again that the EPRDF's economic aim is building capitalism..
As a result, the economic development strategy of EPRDF makes the regions and farmers central where all development forces participate and the majority of the people. At each level becomes beneficiary and where speedy progress would be registered, the spokesperson pointed out..
To this end, the crucial role is that of the people and the investor while the government focuses on establishing infrastructures, arranging the control and follow-up and building the implementation capacity of the leadership who are engaged in development activities of regions, zones and districts, it was pointed out..
The comparative economic freedom would be assured in this economic path an EPRDF's development path being capitalist, it made the Ethiopian farmer who constitutes 85 percent and the regions central, the spokesperson disclosed. .
And this would enable the wide participation of capitalists of the country, develop government's role and would give special focus on backward areas, which has comparative freedom..
However, the mixed outlook held by members was not made to be amended, so there was a situation where the previous outlook was seen in daily lives, and important discussion was underway with regards to the outlook issue, it disclosed.  .
This evaluation meeting which started on June 19 is discussing on various topics, among which the essence of revolutionary Democracy, problems created in EPRDF and inclinations of sinking as well as the 10 year evaluation of executive body.
Around the first agenda, the historical process of Revolutionary Democracy and the stage EPRDF has reached how was presented in a report and wide discussion was held on it.
In the presented explanation, it was reminded that the main ideology the forces which EPRDF embraced during the time of military struggle followed played crucial role to enable the struggle reach its destination.
This program enabled to Ethiopia throw away the military dictatorial government, and for the first time in our country, it enabled to build a constitutional regime that was directly approved by the people's participation, it was pointed out.
Nevertheless, it called for amendment with the new world and national situation, and this had been completed in the medium and general discussions held in the years before 1995, seen in the evaluation the spokesperson pointed out.
The next meeting will be on the topic the Political Aim of Revolutionary Democracy.
From Addis Zemen June 22, 2001
The Ethiopian United Front Discussed in Amsterda.
The Ethiopian United Front (EUF) General Secretary, Mr. Mersha Yoseph reminded that the task of the current political forces is to put pressure on TPLF government to make it give proper responses to the basic questions of the Ethiopian people..
Mr. Mersha expressed this during his speech at the public meeting Ethiopian United Font (EUF) support committee prepared recently for Ethiopians living in Holland, Amsterdam town.
In addition, speakers who were present and gave explanations on the occasion were Dr. Mamo Muche and Mr. Abrham Yayen..
In this meting Yoseph said that the TPLF government paves a conducive ground not only for the Secession of Eritrea but also for the strengthening of EPLF and the act of aggression it has taken recently on Ethiopia, and he continued that, without taking tangible measures to correct the blunder he did on the country and people, it couldn't take out Ethiopia from the abysmal hole of war it put Ethiopia.
More over he explained that the role of opposition organizations should be focused on, leaving aside the struggle for basic changes, and stop running to be the extension of TPLF government, strengthening their unity, creating a conducive situation where political prisoners are going to be released urgently, the rights to freely organize and operate and express ideas are going to be respected, and where all-embracing national discussion come together to collaboratively solve the main political problems, and to urge TPLF to make changes.
Mr. Mersha Yosef, concluding his speech underscored that unless the TPLF government urgently gives clear and unambiguous responses to these secondary questions, the Ethiopian United Front (EUF) would be obliged to reconsider the unilateral cease-fire measure it was taken for the last six months, for the sake of opening a door for peaceful negotiation.
The second speaker, Dr. Mamo Muche, explained that the aggression is waged against the honor and freedom of Ethiopia, so in order to break EPLF's conceit and end the war victoriously in favor of Ethiopian people, all of us have national obligation to do whatever we can, he expressed his call.
Mr. Abrham Yayeh, on his part explained in detail the relationship EPLF and TPLF had before and after the hold power.
The TPLF government, apart from support, directly struggled for the secession of Eritrea, he recalled.
Mr. Abrham Yayeh said that although the referendum that is to be held in Eritrea would be concluded according to what Eritrean people choose, Unity, Federation or Freedom, EPLF cancelled the referendum it lay before and restricted the options in to slavery of freedom, where TPLF didn't show any opposition, and he pointed that the TPLF leaders didn't show any effort to resolve the border conflict.
Finally, he said the TPLF leaders were rather making their effort to divide Ethiopia for the last seven years, than doing something worthy for the benefit of the nation as a whole.
And cooperating with them without preconditions would bring about dangerous results even if the idea of uniting the nation is presented kind-heartedly, he reminded..
After the three speakers gave responses and suggestions for the many questions raised by the participants of the meeting, the program was concluded at 6 o'clock in the evening.

A Holy Father who was given a Name as "Heretic" Condemned the Act
A Holy Father by the name Aba Ketsela Mengistu who has been serving in Ethiopian Orthodox Church at different parishes in Gospel services, and who was called heretic by a tabloid which is named "Sematsedk" condemned it by saying that calling me "heretic" is just a devil's talk..
It is known that hatred that sustained between the two sides of the Orthodox Church has been aggravating, clouds of concern hung in the minds of many church people that this might shake the unified pillar of the Church.
Aba Ketsela who sent the details of accusations charged against many children of the church, not excluding himself, quoting sematsedk newspaper, condemned it, is now living in North America, Canada as Head of Preaching Gospel Department with the Ethiopian Orthodox Church..
I was saddened by what was written about me as heretic in 1998.
I served the church by my skills that are teaching presentation, song, poetry, sacrificial songs..
After I became a monk, I reached from priesthood to elder priest and I never declined form serving the Orthodox Church..
And at the moment in North America (Canada) where I live, I am the Son of the Orthodox church who indulged in preaching gospel and I'm not heretic, and I want to disclose that the disseminated news against me is fruitless, he said..
The news which reached us crossing different continents broadly details Aba Ketsela's grievance against his being called heretic, who said Bishop Merha Kirstos and Bishop Nathnael are my all-time witnesses who taught me the secret of Flesh, the content of the Bible and its interpretations..
"Aba" who has served in preaching the gospel in Miskaye Hazunan Medhanealm monastery and other parishes in Addis Ababa for so many years, and when moved to Canada he was really sad for hearing about his being called heretic and put forward a message reminding the Christian congregation not to be misled by the gossip around.
There are some who claimed that this false allegation of being heretic on many people including Aba Ketsela in not only the problems of the individuals but it is the problem that gradually came to the Orthodox Church..
Most of the people charged in the aforesaid tabloid, were not only suspended from work and salary, but also places like Debre Libanos Monastery too, was disturbed, and changed to land of blood (Akeladam) in August 1998, the insiders are talking about it.
What astounded most was not the aggravation of revengeful enmity between the two sides, but the fact that the church officials didn't want to take any take any decisions..
This problem the religious problem which that is now considered as simple is feared that it may turn out to be difficult, he said.
If those regarded heretic are really found to be so, first like the fore-fathers a congregation would be called and there if they do not confess their sins and return, church would officially declare their sanctions otherwise concerned orthodox bodies say that if church becomes negligent of all these and let people to be sent in exile, applying the principle of "thorn by the thorn" would make it unable to withstand the enemy force within..
This dangerous situation within the Orthodox Church which hasn't been settled for more than half a year now, but is just waiting time to catch fire has saddened those who have true orthodox love.
The religious organization who want these eloquent people with wide knowledge of the church but were violently shoved by church leaders are man, and hence, authorities in the Orthodox Church should have given urgent resolve for such kind of religious controversies..
But as if Orthodox Church is without owner, it's regrettable to see no one whose sympathizer whenever a problem arises.           .
The clergy who controls the two sides hasn't said anything against the so-called heretic or the accusers.
Nor is there any officials statement that comes out of her, she's still soun asleep..
The fight between each other has surpassed the country and continued overseas..
Therefore, Aba Ketsela Mengistu, who lives abroad condemned his defamation from where believes..
This discord between the two orthodox followers unless it gets remedy from now, it is not difficult to predict that the process is going to bring about harm to the church.  .

The Egyptian Ambassador said, "We don't know the reason"

Thanking him for his cooperation, we presented here part of the interview..
Fiameta: Mr. Ambassador, recently you gave aid to Eritrean government..
But when you wanted to give similar aid to Ethiopia, it was reported that you were given no response..
Which body said we won't receive this aid? What was the reason.
Ambassador Marwan Bedir: we don't know why they said they won't receive the aid; as to the body who refreshed the offer, we disclosed in our press statement.
Fiameta: Anyway, how was the aid to be conducted?

Our request to offer the help and cooperation the kind of doctors Ethiopia need didn't get response..
Last time at the bomb blast in Nairobi we offered similar help..
Our minister of health himself went to Nairobi..
The minister is a surgeon..
For people who need plastic surgery, he took them with his people to Cairo and did the surgery himself..
We cooperate in all sectors with other African countries..
But Ethiopia wasn't willing..
For those who give us positive response, we do the necessary cooperation..
Unless it's exaggerated due to the clash Eritrea has with Ethiopia, what's wrong with one county helping another? For example, Italy and Germany helped millions of dollars to Eritrea and they are still helping..
Nobody mentions this European aid..
We don't know why the Egyptian part is magnified..
Wh doesn't appropriate news apply to Egypt?.
It's very disappointing..
As yet, with our relations to Ethiopia, it's the Addis Ababa University and colleges that give us positive responses..
For the medical aid we provide now, the ministry of foreign affairs and Ministry of Health haven't provided us response..
Fiameta: Instead of putting your request through the ministry of foreign affairs, why don't you directly give for the Relief and Rehabilitation commission who's responsible for this?
Ambassador: Our relation is with ministry of foreign affairs..
We don't want to make things complicated again..
According to our common working practice, our situation and quest should be responded by ministry of foreign affairs..
We have up to now good relations..
The problem is we didn't get quick response..
On our side, we would continue the help we provide for Ethiopia, he responded..

Ethiopian and Eritrean border demarcation begins from the past, United Nations news source, IRIN, disclosed.
IRIN quoting the discussion held between the two higher bodies in London last week, pointed out that the disclosure of the border demarcation that was said to start from the east was made during the London meeting the independent Ethio-Eritrean border demarcation commission prepared.
IRIN quoting close diplomatic sources to the process also reported the fact that the border demarcation that covers one thousand kilometers begins in the east is within the liking of Ethiopia.
In the London meeting United Nation Mission for Ethio-Eritrea (UNMEE) head and representative of the general secretary, Kofi Anan, Legwala Joseph was present..
In the Ethio-Eritrean of border demarcation that was made official in April last year, it was to be recalled that additional clear explanation was asked on the different areas of western sides including Bademe.
The Ethio-Eritrea border demarcation would be carried out in the coming May, it was to be recalled.

From Addis Zemen August 27, 2004
New Historical relics were found at around the place where obelisk of Axum Stoo.
The United Nations Education, Science and cultural organization (UNESCO) disclosed that it has discovered new historical sites at around the place where the obelisk of Axum and at other Axum sites where international relics were registered.
In the statement UNESCO disclosed yesterday, the new historical relies were discovered last week by he team of experts which was sent by UNESCO to help fix the obelisk of Axum.
According to Elizzbeth Wangari an expert of UNESCO's Centre for Relics, and Jum William, member of the organization's International Historical Relics, the newly found relics which were discovered at a location the obelisk of Axum previously stood, were different rooms and graves of emperors.
In the area of these new discoveries, there are several graves of emperor, it was proved through the study made by various experts of the team, the statement disclosed.
When Kochiro Matu Sura UNESCO's Director heard the news of the new discovery, he said that the fact that the discovered relics are grave yards become "a great and useful discovery", expressing his admiration.
The phenomenon that was brought about by the trial not only invites researchers to work more, it would make Axum an international centre for relics research, the statement of UNESCO pointed out, and this in turn, would have great contribution to Ethiopian Tourism economic development, it stated.
Foldofo Fatovich, leader of the geological research higher experts' team expressed that especially the graveyard discoveries would be studied deeply at a laboratory institution in one university in Italy.
The following graveyard researches would be done with Italian and Ethiopian governments full recognition and permission, UNSCO disclosed.        .
The expert team that came to Ethiopia to help fix the obelisk of Axum possesses modern hi-tech instruments that look in to the earth's situation easily, including the radar of the earth, and collect information, it was pointed out.

More than Three Hundred International Observers are Said to be Engaged.
In the May election more than three hundred international observers are said to be engaged, the chairman of the Ethiopian National Electoral Board disclosed.
Mr. Kemal Bedri, the chairman, in the statement he gave to local and international journalists yesterday disclosed that international observers are represented from African Union, European Union, Arab League and Carter Center as well as from embassies of different countries.
Among the ones who asked to observe the election and that have diplomatic missions, American, Japan, China, India and Turkey embassies, the chairman pointed out. .
In this year's election, 319 international observers got permissions up to now; Japan and China embassies have interest to engage additional observers other than the ones whom they assigned earlier, he disclosed.
Regarding local observers, those who have assuredly got permission as yet are three religious organizations, he pointed out..
On the other hand, the board reminded that any decision related to the election process that political parties give in the electoral offices should respect the ethics of election activities which the board releases accordingly..
No candidate could place its poster and its symbol of candidacy out of the regions it competes.
Within a 500 diameter of a polling station it is forbidden to carry out political agitation, the instruction the board released pointed out. .

The editor of the newspapers Dawit Bekele didn't want to discontinue his job and career even while he's in the midst to this difficult testing period.
Although working with devotion and with clear purpose is basic characteristic of Ethiopians in general, we don't want him to pay unnecessary sacrifice.
That's why we decided that the two siblings, Dawit Kebede and Biruk Kebede, be temporarily withdrawn from this career and we want the friends of Fiameta, in the county and overseas to realize this.
We want to use this opportunity to disclose that our producer and editior-in-chier is a life-long member of the International Press Institute, member of media and Information in the United Nations, ECA, and the executive member and public relations Officer of the Free Press Journalist Association.

The Charges CUD filed against Prime Minister Meles is ordered to be given judgment after it's cleaned up by the Federation Counci.
The charge coalition for Unity and Democracy filed against Prime Minister of the Federal government, Meles Zenawi, was ordered to be given judgment after it's cleaned up by constitutional clearing up assembly of the Federation council..
The Federal First Instance Court Second civil code court session yesterday gave its judgment stating that the rule prime Minster Meles declared on May 15, 2005 violates the constitution..
Since it violates the privilege proclamation no.3/83 gives to demonstrate, conduct a meeting and organize, it gave the judgment based on the charge CUD field to lift the rule..
The Court of Session viewed the presented appeal with proper laws and found out the case needs constitutional interpretation.          .
Hence, since the body responsible for deciding, after clearing-up, is the constitutional clear-up assembly of the Federation council, the court passed a judgment to send this case to the assembly so that in its power to decide whether the rule Prime Minister declared violated the constitution or not.

From Tobia September 25, 1997
Ethiopian National Bank Announced that it has printed the new Birr note..
550 stations would give service of Birr note exchange
Solomon Teumelesa.
The Ethiopian National Bank disclosed that it has printed a new Birr note that would put in to use in the future and it has made enough preparation to start the work..
The governor of the bank Mr. Dubale Jale in his press statement yesterday disclosed that the printing of the new Birr note was distributed to the selected major areas in order to start exchange service..
He also made if official that the prepared money were 1, 5, 10, 50 and 100 Birr notes.
He also reminded that the old Birr notes has to be exchanged within 50 days form the day the money exchange is to be announced in the media sometime in the future..
He also explained that 21 days were allotted for the exchange of 50 and 100 Birr while 50 days were given for 1, 5 and 10 Birr notes..
The reason why various days were allotted to the Birr notes is that the 50 and 100 Birr notes are believed mostly to be found around cities, so these notes could be exchanged swiftly..
Mr. Dubale told that since the 1, 5 and 10 Birr notes are widely used by the country people, and they may find media difficulties, additional days were allotted..
Mr. Dubale pointed out that in order to make the exchange of Birr notes, 20 major stations were set up that coordinate branch office banks and temporary stations, and these stations are found in Addis Ababa, mekele, Dessie, Woldia, Gondar, Bahir Dar, Debre Markos, Debreberhan, Nazareth, Awassa, Shahemene, Asela, wolayta, Sodo, Hageremariam, Nekemte, Gimbi, Meth, Jima, Diredawa and Harar cities..
In addition where there are no brances of banks, three hundred temporary stations that give money exchange services are set up, Mr. Doubale explained..
250 government and private banks give the exchange services and in general 550 exchange stations are to be established, it was disclosed..
In order to do his work, two thousand workers were assigned and enough work instructions are setup, the necessary materials and tools for the exchange of Birr have already been prepared, he explained..
Both new and old Birr notes would be functional side by side starting form the date the bank officially discloses the exchange of the money until the last date, so till that last day, it would be illegal to disqualify the old Birr note, he underscored..
In order to avoid such and related problems, preparations have been underway to give appropriate awareness for the community, Mr. Dubale explained.
Different posters have been prepared to make people aware of the new Birr notes, it's reported.
The public created enough cooperation with regional police and armies of the defense force in order to protect trouble some and those who are engaged in looting activities.
Since the new Birr notes are made cautiously, it would be difficult to forge replication, said Mr. Dubale, And added that they are made in such a way that the public could identify and put in to use. .
Related to this he pointed out that the cents that are in use at the moment won't be changed..
It is to be recalled that the Birr notes which are in use at present were produced some 20 years ago.

"There's Nothing that Forbids us from Going to the War!
Seyoum Mesfi.
Ethiopian Minister of Foreign Affairs Mr. Seyoum Mesfin gave an interview to voice of America On June 1, 1991 condemning EPLF's belligerence. .
When answering as to what kind of follow-up is done on Eritrean in Ethiopia, "Among them it's not to say that there aren't some who follow Eritrean government's stand and policy..
It's not right to see all Eritreans who are in Ethiopia this perspective; apart from those sides who have blind outlook and those who are mislead to take wrong measures these people are dangerous to the country's security and lasting peace; it doesn't consider them as risky.
We are expected to make them work and benefit themselves and Ethiopia just like any foreigners.   .
With regards to the started efforts of negotiation by various sides, "I want to make it clear that if there is any picture of negotiation going on between Ethiopia and Eritrea, this is not the right understanding and pictures..
There's no negotiation underway between the two governments..
There's a clear proclamation stated by the council of Ministers and MPs that answers as to what would the conditions Ethiopian government consider to get in to negotiation..
This is the fact that Eritrean troops should leave the areas that it occupied by force crossing the Ethiopian border..
"Not only leaving the area, but also Ethiopian government must rebuild the former administration in the area..
After that questions that could be raised or contentious issues about that area or another could be solved, through bilateral negotiation process, or if that's not possible, through a third party, this is what we believe..
"In order to facilitate this process, the present IGAD chairman, President Hassen Guled of Djibouti, is doing his level best..
In addition, OAU's Secretary Dr. Salim is putting his own effort..
Above all, United States and Rwandan governments together they are putting effort to curb the situation before it's turning into an all-out war.  .
"...If we are forced to a situation where we should protect our sovereignty, that kind of war is self protective, and a war of keeping sovereignty and this is our right and we know that no one would forbid us..
Therefore, we are not that no one would forbid us..
There's nothing that forbid us from going to the war..
But to make peace reign, resolve peacefully it requires patience and for-sightedness..
Both Ethiopian and Eritrean people clearly know the cause of the war..
So, we are not in a hurry to engage ourselves in war..
On the Ethiopian side we know that support is being offered to friendly governments who go to and from the two cities making efforts..
I wish they succeed..
"...As I said before, however, in order to resolve the situation peacefully, both for bilateral mutual peaceful negotiation and with the inclusion of a third party, the Eritrean government, without any condition, should take out its troops from the areas it occupied forcefully denouncing our sovereignty."  .
He responded with regards to the prevalent severe clash..
From Fiameta June 3, 1998
Editorial
Have They Missed it Now or Were They not Having It Even Before.
According to the regular columnist expression in last week's Tobia magazine, and taking cognizance of the general situation, the tribal politics that has started in this country in the new order is heading towards having different forms and contents.
The disseminators of this regiment most often use these tantalizing and seemingly good, soft words and phrases, "nation, nationality, to enable people learn in their own language, to make them judged by their own language, to develop and preserve their culture, to administer themselves..
Basically, it's appropriate to respect people's rights..
Who would be defected if one speaks with its own language, if one becomes proud of one's culture and history, if one administers oneself?
What is saddening, however, is the diffusion of hatred among people under the cover of this beautiful idea; in the confusion, rather than the people, as was propagated, the beneficiaries are few.
When the true picture and the right cover of our present working procedure is unfolded, the plan of division it has for this people has become clear..
The plot to unbind the unity of these people who live side by side, whose fate is interwoven and people who work together for the development of its country, didn't take long time and effort to be uncovered..
So, after we have reached here, it seems that a new round campaign is opened..
Even at the outset, the philosophy of regional establishment, which was the promotion ladder for tribal politics, was feared that it would lead to racism..
The free press families who stood for unity were fighting this tendency..
As it has been indicated in the Tobia magazine, it is being considered as political ideology and trying to push it forward by certain members of the ruling party.
Although this is not the outlook and belief of most of the Tigrina-speaking people, its risk would be great if the flood increases..
Its risk would be for the whole people; especially for those few who use the name of that "nationality and nation" We said the language; identity, religion and history of any people should be respected an honored..
As long as they help for the development of all the people, the special identities of any people should be seen, even, like holy characteristics..
Before the tribe agitation of government and party cadres subsides, practical activities broaden their scope from tribalism to racism.
It seems that there's a tendency of clinging to a certain language, certain tribe and religion..
We see the speaker of one language from a small community leading and controlling all the activities of the communities.
What is very saddening is those who claimed that they've learnt modern education and said they would fight for people's right have been found cooperative to this process today.
The short question people ask "Why?" this is it.
This question should be asked by all of us and in turn we should defend it..
On our side, we say let's limit the racial hierarchy, tribal politics and the advancing tendency for its dangerous..
This direction would clash people with people, invites destruction and it is dangerous tendency for the peace of this county..
When we see this racist and tribal air blowing from those areas who claim to live up with the honored press work, our heart bloods.  .
The ethics of the profession worldwide legislative decree highly forbids dividing people in tribe and religion in the work of the press.
When we see these worldwide prohibitions are violated by employed whippier snapper "writers" who claimed yesterday that they stood for the entire working community, without differentiating race and tribe, become sorrowful..
Have the missed the ethics of being principled or were they not having it even before?
We say.
We would be forced to express repeatedly that the solution for it is clam political and peaceful campaign.
Because the result of defending racist stand with racism, the politics of arrogance with another arrogant and provocative politics would be destruction;
And still today their followers are singing that same song, they're tuning it up.
In our belief racial politics and racism, where ever it comes from, should be condemned.
In fact multi-national peoples' parties and opposition forces should withstand this tendency.
Otherwise, the result is dangerous.

Ethiopia and Russia would sign military Agreement
Prime Minister of Russia, victor Chernomyrdin ordered his defense minister to produce a document of agreement with regards to the military cooperation with Ethiopia, a (flying letter) named "Indian Ocean News Letter" disclosed, in its second week edition of October.
It disclosed in its No. 782 edition.

Besides, the content of agreement is thought to be that Russian military experts would come to Ethiopia and repair Mig 21, 23 and 24 fighter planes and other ammunitions.
Regarding the agreement, inside sources say that in order to make this agreement practical, Russian Defense Force would open one office in Ethiopia.

From Addis Zemen June 2, 2001
His Majesty's Funeral Has Become Controversial!
An Ascetic terrorizes claiming that if the corpse of Emperor Haileselassie I doesn't rest in honor, Ethiopia won't be peaceful!!
After being killed on August 29, 1974, the corps was found in a well that was dug next to the toilet of Mengistu Hailemariam, has not been officially buried with absolution and funeral ceremony, which has become the main topic of discussion recently.
After the corpse was found through digging, it is to be recalled that as to whether it was really his, his ex-personal doctor, professor Asrat Woldeyes certified.
After a year EPFDF came to power during the transition government individuals from the clergy, patriots' Association, and families were chosen and allowed to get in to the palace to find His majesty's corpse were given responsibilities and authority from investigating various documents up to having dug the places where he was said to be buried, and finally got the corpse.
In order to carry out the funeral ceremony after the corpse was found, the Ethiopian Patriots Association and the then MOA Anbessa Organization entered in to dispute that led the delay of the funeral.
Again after the dispute was made to calm down and at the time the preparation for the funeral ceremony was about to be carried out, people's revolt came about.
The question was "His majesty's funeral should not be carried out just like any ordinary individual".
The other question the opposition raised seven years before was "Let government declare a one-day mourning and carry out the funeral ceremony..."
His majesty was not only a father of Ethiopia but also for Africa, so government would give focus and he would be buried with the participation of the public.
Since there were ideas like these, the issue was asked to pass or to the people instead of just the MOA Anbessa and the Patriots' Association.
Based on this, with a seal of Patriots' Association and the signature of the chairman this question was put forward to the transitional government but couldn't get urgent response.
The preparation for the funeral ceremony was made to discontinue and based on the consent of the crown-prince in England and the people the funeral ceremony was decided to be carried out at another time.
The elderly people that were chosen to negotiate MOA Anbessa and the patriots' associations then formed a committee and started their activities, but they were not able to continue up to the end.
However, since 1995, ascetics who claimed to have seen a vision came to Addis Ababa told, "If His majesty's corpse don not rest in honor, a very great turmoil would be created" and terrorized the families of the king as well as the public, the committee that constituted elders started again its activities to carry out the ceremony in 1995.
Nevertheless, since this elderly committee who were formed to carry out the funeral ceremony needed to be legal body it has continued its effort to be a legal body and to be given full authority to carry out the funeral ceremony from 1995-1999 and it's to recalled that last years it got a government permission...The Haileselase I Memorial Organization.
Since the organization got this permission, it has met various obstacles to carry out the funeral ceremony.
Issues starting from whether to make the funeral ceremony on a holiday, to calling popular personality's form abroad to Ethiopia have become contentious.
Actually the situation was just like what the ascetic said that the country seemed to stay in drought and war until his majesty's corpse came to rest in honor.
As Fiameta newspapers was following the matter closely it falls upon it a responsibility to present to the public the ongoing disputes with regards to the funeral ceremony.
Among the disputes raised recently is found that there was a dispatch on the internet and in some tabloids that claimed the king's family living abroad didn't accept the legal body formed by the name Haileselassie I Memorial Organization and the fact that the funeral ceremony was to be carried out together with TPLF individuals, which saddened the organization.
In the statement the organization released last week, disclosed that the king's family didn't say that and the news was far from truth.
Some sources said that it's Lord Mengesha's line of the king family who exaggerate this.
There are still others who claim that this was just defamation of an ordinary nature.
Anyway, the controversy continued.
The other which seems ordinary, but whenever the funeral ceremony is mentioned creates a dispute is how the corpse is transported how the procession make its way.
They all seem to agree on one point.
The corpse would be taken out from the St. Mary church where it had been put temporarily and move by St. Gabriel church making its was by ministry of Foreign Affairs and passing by the Jubilee Palace, the corpse heads to Masquel Square where it rests for a while.
At masquel Square in the presence of invited guests and the public a ceremony of delivery speech for the occasion would be carried out.
It's the procession after this that became disputable.
One of the sides say that after the masquel square, the corpse would go to Laghar then through Churchil Road make its way to St. George church; then by piazza to Arat Kilo, Holy Trinity Cathedral, while the other group from Masquel Square, through Laghar straight to Mexico Avenue and would make its way to Tekle Haimanot Church, Passing the General Habte Ghiorgis bridge would reach to St. George church, then via Afincho Ber by the side of the University take rest at miskiyazunal church.
This seemingly ordinary, but disputable issue has not been resolved as yet.
However, there's a point which all agree.
The reason they have for the corpse to come at Miskiyazunal church which is found next to Teferi Makonnen School, was that "the miskiyazunal Ark of the Tabernacle was in exile together with the king His majesty, and came back afterwards and a church was built to it, and up to 1974 it was administered from his majesty' personal savings".
Therefore, it's after the corpse reposed here that it should go down wards to Holy Trinity Cathedral, they say.
The other and the main contentious issue was as to when the funeral ceremony would be carried out? This is the question.
According to the internal sources, the funeral ceremony was planned to be carried on the coming may 5, 2000 for its Freedom Day and there won't be any work.
But since this would be most regrettable and shameful act, it's already been criticized.
May 5 is Independent day.
It was a holy the day the Italians went out fully from Ethiopia and it was a day when His majesty came back to Addis Ababa.
To bury His majesty on such a great independent day would not only be sorrowful, it would also be interpreted differently among others.
Changing Independent day by a Funeral day is like committing crime on a generation.
Therefore, by any standard, making may 5 a funeral day would be an unforgivable mistake.
The Haileselassie I memorial organization is by now preparing a letter to the prime Minster in order to carry out the funeral ceremony on this date.
The other problem of May 5 is that the time where EPRDF and other oppositions would make fierce struggle for the upcoming election.
In addition, there's a worry that time government and private Medias would be focusing on the election and the funeral ceremony could be underestimated.
Apart from this, dates chosen for the funeral ceremony are July 24, His majesty's birthday, August 29 the date on which he was killed by the Derge regime, October 31 his day of coronation, all of which were unaccepted for one reason or another.
And so the dispute continues.
But the people have some decisive questions.
Why does the HaileSelasse I organization need to carryout the funeral ceremony along with other holidays?  Why can't the funeral ceremony be held on a separate day?  Why couldn't it be on any ordinary Saturday and Sunday when people are free?  These are the questions raised.

She thanked her families, friends and sport associates who stood beside her in her victory in Athens Olympiad.
